Description:
Field Technician - 6 MonthsOur client is leading global telecom company in UAE. They are now looking for a Technician to join them for 6 month's project.Roles & Responsibilitiesinstall and set up the POS devices at the merchant's location
Providing detailed records of the installation process to his field managerSalary: AED 4500 - AED 5500Skills
Skills:
Fluency in English is a must
Willing to work 6 days in a week, from 9:00 AM till 5:00 PM
Immediate joiners only
Technical Knowledge and understanding of the POS devices, their hardware components and software functionality
must have strong troubleshooting skills

Knowledge about different POS terminal transactions
UAE car Driving license is mandatory
